title: rAmA ninu nammina vADugA
sahitya:
rAmA ninu nammina vADugA nanu rakSimpa samayamidEgA O sItA


anupallavi

  bhIma parAkrama kAmita phalada sAmaja varada sAkEta nilaya shrI


caraNam 1    talli taNDri nIvE gAdA nE iTu tallaDilla jUDa mariyAdA
pallavAdhari sIta nItOnu bAguga delpalEdA paTTAbhi
    caraNam 2    nI pAdamulanu nE viDuvanurA rAma nirjaramauni sannutanAma
shrIpatE sukumAra dayApara pApavidUra bhAvaja janaka O
    caraNam 3    aparAdhulainavArini kAvalEdA nA aparAdhamula kSamincarAdA
kapaTa mAnupavEpa sadAshiva vinuta karuNajUDara vEgamE kalyANa
